description: A classic lightweight short sleeve woven shirt in their Cool-Lite™ blend of merino wool and TENCEL™. Can be worn buttoned up for a smart look or open and layered over a tee for a more casual look.
name: Icebreaker Steveston SS Shirt - Mens

specs.value: 120gm² Woven Twill, 55% Merino Wool, 45% TENCEL TM
